data.fullContent: Ann adores her job as a firefighter. Even though it can be frightening at times, she loves that she is saving lives and homes. Much of her day is spent at the station, but when a case comes in that there is a fire, everyone hurries to help others. It's an exciting job, but a bit scary.
data.answer: Ann热爱消防队员的工作。尽管有时会很可怕，但她很高兴自己正在拯救生命和家园。她一天的大部分时间都是在车站度过的，但当发生火灾时，每个人都赶紧去帮助别人。这是一份令人兴奋的工作，但也有点可怕。
